strapiPost.title: Celebrate Mother's Day At The Botanical Garden Of The Ozarks
strapiPost.content:
Celebrate mom at the Botanical Garden of the Ozarks' Motherâ€™s Day in the Garden event on Sunday, May 14, from 9a-4p.

  • A little planting: Enjoy a tour of the Garden and stop by the various craft stations where you can make a mini-bouquet and a personalized Mother's Day card, plus, all moms will receive a free succulent from the BGO greenhouse while supplies last.
  • A little shopping: Trailside Coffee Co. will be present with refreshments, and local vendors will have merchandise for sale like jams & jellies from Parmelee Homestead Creations and artwork & stickers from Kandra Creates.

Admission is $10 for adults, $5 for kids ages 4-12, and free for children 3 and under. Register in advance or renew your membership HERE.
